txt.en: Stone-giants can be found on the northern edge of the Gladdenmere.\n\nYou should defeat any stone-giants that you find in the Gladdenmere.
You defeated many of the stone-giants that were driven to frenzy by the dead that walk the Gladdenmere, and the earth will no longer rumble beneath their hostile tread.

Stone-giants hold the northern edge of the Gladdenmere, from the shoreline to the slopes of the mountains, and have been stirred into a frenzy by the dead that walk in Kidzul-k√¢lah. If the Gladdenmere is to be made safe for the Wilderfolk of the Vales, these giants need to be defeated.
The stone-giants of the Gladdenmere rumble along in a frenzy.
